title: Welcome to the Scam-demic: Motherhacker Season 2!
description:
In the scam-landscape of a pandemic, Bridget (Carrie Coon) gets caught in a crisis of loyalty between her hacker life, the FBI, and her own family, and has to use her unique skills to escape.

All episodes of Motherhacker Season 2 available June 7th, only on Spotify.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
